Summary: Round silver ball in storm clouds
divs: Sighting DetailsI was taking pictures of the sunset reflected on the clouds in the eastern sky. When I downloaded the pictures, I noticed this ball and other possible similar shapes in the picture. I have watched the sky in sucessive nights and seen what appear to be round objects blinking on and off as they change direction and move around in the clouds. cannot see them as they move, only when they blink.
